name: Quickly Integrate Tailwind CSS into an Existing Next.js App in Just 4 Steps
description: Recent versions of Next.js come packaged with Tailwind CSS, which we can enable during project creation. If you missed installing it out of the box, this guide will walk you through four simple steps to install and configure Tailwind CSS. Even though this post is tailored for Next.js, a similar method can be used to set up Tailwind in a React.js application as well.
